shape_0_per_frame2=y=y+sin(time*2)/2.5;
shape_0_per_frame3=r2=above(treb,mid*1.1)*sin(time*1.2)*bass;
shape_0_per_frame4=g2=above(treb,bass)*sin(time*1.0)*bass;
shape_0_per_frame5=b2=above(bass,mid*1.1)*sin(time*1.4)*treb;

shape_1_per_frame1=x1=x+sin(time)/3.5+sin(time*0.2)*0.3;
shape_1_per_frame2=y1=y+cos(time)/3.5+cos(time*0.25)*0.3;
shape_1_per_frame3=r2=above(treb,mid*1.1)*cos(time*1.2)*bass;
shape_1_per_frame4=g2=above(treb,bass)*cos(time*1.0)*bass;
shape_1_per_frame5=b2=above(bass,mid*1.1)*cos(time*1.4)*treb;
shape_1_per_frame6=rade=rad+mid/12;

shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=1;
per_frame_2=wave_b=1-sin(sin(time*0.1122)*pow(mid_att,8));
per_frame_3=wave_r=1-sin(sin(time*0.7122)*pow(treb_att,9));
per_frame_4=wave_g=1-sin(sin(time*0.3122)*pow(bass_att,7));
per_frame_5=ob_r = ob_r + 0.2*sin(time*0.5413);
per_frame_6=ob_g = ob_g + 0.2*sin(time*0.6459);
per_frame_7=ob_b = ob_b + 0.2*sin(time*0.4354);
per_frame_8=arg=bass_att+mid_Att+treb_Att;
per_frame_9=re2=above(treb_att,mid_att);
per_frame_10=re1=above(bass_att,mid_att);
per_frame_11=react=pow(bass_att+1,mid_att+bass_att+2);
per_frame_12=mv_g =10*(wave_r-wave_b) ;
per_frame_13=mv_b =10*(wave_g-wave_g) ;
per_frame_14=mv_r =10*(wave_b-wave_r) ;
per_frame_15=q1=0.1*pow(bass_att+1,treb_att*8+1)/fps;
per_frame_16=micro=bass_att+1-treb_Att+treb/treb_att*mid_att*0.1;
per_frame_17=dx8=0.007*mid_att-0.006*bass;
per_frame_18=dy8=-0.01;
per_pixel_1=hook=sqr(sqrt(2*x+2*y)-0.2*rad);
per_pixel_2=signal=above(hook+sin(ang),cos(rad*31.4));
per_pixel_3=zoom=0.985+above(sqr(sqr(tan(time*1.5+sqrt(asin(rad)+acos(y)))))*0.01-0.12,rad);
per_pixel_4=rot4=if(above(hook,rad),sqr(sqr(tan(ang*rad*2)))*0.07,rot);
per_pixel_5=sx8=sx+0.1*sqrt(1+sqr(sqr(tan(rad*bass*4))))*above(mid_att,treb_att*1.05);
per_pixel_6=cyw=dy+0.005*sqrt(1+sqr(sqr(tan(rad*treb*4))))*below(sin(time*0.7),0.08)
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
warp_5=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_6=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
warp_7=`    float2 uv_dz = uv + float2(dy.z,-dx.z)*texsize.zw*60;
warp_8=`    ret.z = (GetPixel(uv_dz).z + (GetPixel(uv).z - GetBlur1(uv).z)*200*length(uv_dz-uv))*0.96 - 0.02;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`
warp_11=`    d = texsize.zw*4;
warp_12=`    dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_13=`    dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
warp_14=`
warp_15=`    float2 uv_dy = uv_orig + float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*6;
warp_16=`    ret.y = GetPixel(uv_dy).y + (GetPixel(uv).y - GetBlur1(uv).y)*0.1 - 0.016;
warp_17=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_18=`                      ((uv.xyy+float3(lum(roam_sin.xy),
warp_19=`                                           lum(roam_cos.yx),
warp_20=`                                           0)*0.5
warp_21=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_22=`                      ).xyz*
warp_23=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_24=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.2 
warp_25=`                     );
warp_26=`ret *= (noise2)*3; 
warp_27=`//ret.y = 0;
warp_28=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`uv+=time*.001*roam_sin;
comp_4=`    float2 d = texsize.zw;
comp_5=`    float3 dx = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_6=`    float3 dy = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_7=`float2 dz = float2(dx.y,dy.y)*3;
comp_8=`
comp_9=`d = texsize.zw*2;
comp_10=`dx = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) )*0.5;
comp_11=`dy = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) )*0.5;
comp_12=`
comp_13=`dz +=float2(dx.y,dy.y);
comp_14=`
comp_15=`float3 bg = pow(length(dz)*0.8+0,0.7)*2 + GetBlur1(uv).y*2;
comp_16=`
comp_17=`ret = bg*float3(0.2,0.3,0.6);
comp_18=`float2 uv_swimmer =frac(0.5 + (uv-0.5)+float2(q19,q20)*float2(-1,1));
comp_19=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(3,2,1),GetBlur3(uv_swimmer -float2(dx.y,dy.y)).x);
comp_20=`ret = lerp(ret,0,GetBlur2(uv_swimmer-dz).x);
comp_21=`ret-=roam_sin.wzy*roam_cos;
comp_22=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_23=`                      ((uv.xyy+float3(lum(roam_sin.xy),
comp_24=`                                           lum(roam_cos.yx),
comp_25=`                                           0)*0.5
comp_26=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_27=`                      ).xyz*
comp_28=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_29=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.2 
comp_30=`                     );
comp_31=`ret *= (noise2)*1; 
comp_32=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(0,0,0),0.75*GetPixel(uv_swimmer).x);
comp_33=`ret = lerp(ret,0,GetBlur1(uv).z*4);
comp_34=`ret = lerp(ret,2,GetPixel(uv).z);
comp_35=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_36=`ret-=roam_sin*roam_cos.zxy;
comp_37=`ret=.5-ret;
comp_38=`}
